alert.note: Alert for Crockett (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 3:42PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Crockett County through 415 PM CDT... At 340 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southeast of Ozona, moving slowly south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, frequent lightning and pea size hail. Heavy rainfall in a short period of time could cause localized flooding of low water crossings. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... The Intersection Of Highway 163 And Ranch Road 1973. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
